data.title: Beck Premieres ‘Saw Lightning,’ a New Collaboration with Pharrell Williams — Listen
data.meta_description: Beck will release a new album sometime soon -- and in the meantime, here's his energetic new single with Pharrell Williams as a preview.
data.text:
Beck (Citizen Kane Wayne)

Innovative singer/songwriter Beck is gearing up for a big summer. Not only is he heading out on a co-headlining tour with Cage the Elephant (dates and info here), but on Monday he premiered a new song, “Saw Lightning,” a collaboration with Pharrell Williams.

The song is the lead single from Beck’s newly-announced album, Hyperspace, which will be released via Capitol Records at an as yet undetermined point in the space time continuum, per the news release.

The schedule of dates for Beck’s tour with Cage the Elephant (whose new album, Social Cues, is out this Friday):

Thursday, July 11, 2019 Ridgefield, WA Sunlight Supply Amphitheater*
